name: Heroic Puzzle
description:
This is a colorful 3D puzzle game in which you will use your brain.Complete all the levels and show that you are an ultra-brain!I found 3 bugs, this will be fixed in the next update!
 1 - you may get stuck in the texture. 
2-After passing the last level, you will not get to the menu. 
3-the music does not loop.
